EmailTemplate.name: OOS Program Approved Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Ohio Registration Approved for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An Ohio registration has been approved for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}, a program {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Type_of_License__c} in {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.State_of_License_Certification_Exemption__c}. The Ohio Out of State Registration Number for this program is {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_ProgramNumber__c}.
Ohio will not reimburse for publicly funded child care at this location until the Ohio Department of Job & Family Services (ODJFS) Provider Agreement has been submitted. To submit your ODJFS Provider Agreement go to http://jfs.ohio.gov/cdc/CCIDS.stm. If your license/certification/exemption has expired or been revoked, notify the ODJFS Help Desk at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
